title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
**Elevate Your Computing Experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse**

Discover the power of precision and convenience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, the ultimate solution for those seeking a versatile and efficient navigation experience.

Featuring a sleek and compact design, this mouse is available in three stylish colors - red, gray, and white - to match your unique style. Its ergonomic dimensions (7 inches long, 2.5 inches high, and 4 inches wide) ensure comfortable use for both left- and right-handed users.

The Trackman Marble 2017 boasts an impressive 300 DPI optical trackball, allowing for smooth and accurate navigation. With two intuitive buttons and side-to-side scrolling capabilities, you can effortlessly explore your digital world.

Equipped with both PS/2 and USB connectivity options, this mouse seamlessly integrates with your computer setup, ensuring a hassle-free experience. Whether you're a gamer, creative professional, or simply looking for a reliable navigation solution, the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is the perfect choice.

**Key Benefits:**

- 300 DPI optical trackball for precise navigation
- Ergonomic design suitable for left- and right-handed users
- Compact dimensions for comfortable use
- Two intuitive buttons and side-to-side scrolling capabilities
- Dual connectivity options (PS/2 and USB)
- Available in three stylish colors (red, gray, and white)

**Upgrade your computing experience today with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. Order now and discover a world of precision and convenience!**
